document_name_accent: ung thu vom hong giai doan dau.json
document_title: Early stage nasopharyngeal cancer: Signs, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_name: ung-thu-vom-hong-giai-doan-dau.json_3_Diagnosis and early detection of nasopharyngeal cancer in the early stages
subsection_content:
Doctors can use a number of methods to screen and diagnose, if nasopharyngeal cancer is suspected, such as:
Ask about the patient's and family's medical history, about lifestyle, nutrition as well as other factors that can increase the risk of developing nasopharyngeal cancer;; ENT endoscopy;; Computed tomography (CT) or PET/CT;; Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI);; Biopsy through ENT endoscopy: a sample of an abnormal tumor or lesion is clicked during ENT endoscopy, then histological testing is done to help determine whether it is benign or malignant, to diagnose diagnose cancer.
subsection_title: ung thu vom hong giai doan dau.json. Diagnosis and early detection of nasopharyngeal cancer in the early stages
